p: The assay was determined by a colorimetric method using Quercetin as standard. Take 200 μl sample prepared in 95% methanol extract and phosphate buffer (40 mM, pH 6.8). Added 50 μl AlCl 2 (10%) 50 μl Potassium Acetate (1M) Incubate the mixture at room temperature for 40 minutes and take the reading at 415 nm absorbance.
